Description:
In the Iron Brigade - the players play the role of a soldier Mobile Trench Brigade, who opposed the invasion of aliens known as Monovision.
The action unfolds in a brick-busting action alternative reality during the Second World War. By controlling giant robots, armor and weapons which can be set, players will carry out various missions around the world.
